study_plan_entry.title: Light sources: optical fiber and waveguide lasers

free_text.Learning outcomes: [li] Understanding of waveguide laser concepts and design[br/][li] Acquiring skills for waveguide laser development[br/][li] Overview about actual research and applications[br/]
free_text.Content: [li] Spectra of rare earth ions, Intra-ionic processes, inter ionic interaction[br/][li] Materials and waveguide fundamentals (planar and circular)[br/][li] Basics of lasers and amplifiers, pump and resonator geometries[br/][li] Bragg grating fiber lasers[br/][li] Pulsed fiber lasers[br/][li] Upconversion lasers and non-linear waveguide lasers[br/][li] Waveguide laser zoo[br/][li] hands-on on fiber splicing and handling, fiber, fiber laser characterization[br/][li] visit of Swiss fiber manufacturer (optional)[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: [li] Basics in physics (electrodynamics, waves, atomic physics)[br/][li] Basics in optics (lightwave, diffraction, lasers)[br/]
